body:
It appears that IndexedSlices has not been considered throughout the AllReduce code of MirroredStrategy.
What would be the best possible way to accumulate IndexedSlices gradients? Seems there are other "hacks" regarding IndexedSlices in the code base: [https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/gradients_impl.py](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/gradients_impl.py)
